name: YOBA
description: Collect all coins on the level to reach the next one. Avoid the dangers on your way. Just remember, you have only one chance, if you die, you will start again!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel dual core 2.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: HD 6770 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 45 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: HD 6850 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 45 MB available space
